pages.text: In a first for the parasites, it appears Vagrants prefer well lit spaces, likely as a result of their human origins.

Many Vagrant hives were covered in Gloom Torches, corrupt torches that did not appear to repel parasites from wandering nearby. The glow appears to only affect non-parasite hostile entities, and also extends its effects to any bordering light sources.

Vagrants appear to produce these by giving Factories torches, which they will transmute into Gloom Torches for use elsewhere.$(br)Interestingly enough, parasites which would normally seek out and destroy light sources will deliberately ignore these, as well as any adjacent light source.
$(#630000)It would be wise to put Gloom Torches adjacent to any Furnaces or other light-emitting appliances I use. That way, the others won't break them.
